metadata.Title: STMP (Soil temperature simulator)
metadata.Institution: Crop Science Group, Katzenburgweg 5, 53115 Bonn, Germany
metadata.Extended description: Calculates the daily average soil temperature at the center of each soil layer using a lagged combination of previous day temperature and a depth- and damping-depth-weighted combination of surface and annual temperatures. Damping depth is computed from bulk density and soil water content; surface temperature is estimated from air temps and radiation and can be adjusted for cover. Implements STMP = LAG*STMP0 + (1-LAG)*(FZ*(AVT-DST0)+DST0) with FZ and DD as in Williams & Izaurralde (2005).
metadata.Short description: Soil temperature calculation for soil layers (STMP).

process.name: process
process.description: Calculate daily soil temperature and daily temperature change for each soil layer; updates SoilTempArray and rSoilTempArrayRate.

inputs.name: cFirstDayMeanTemp
inputs.description: Mean air temperature on first day

inputs.name: cAVT
inputs.description: Constant Temperature of deepest soil layer - use long term mean air temperature

inputs.name: cDampingDepth
inputs.description: Initial value for damping depth of soil

inputs.name: iDoInitialize
inputs.description: Switch to re-initialize the model with initial values.

inputs.name: iSoilWaterContent
inputs.description: Water content, sum of whole soil profile

inputs.name: SoilTempArray
inputs.description: Array of soil temperatures in layers

inputs.name: pSoilLayerDepth
inputs.description: Depth of soil layer plus additional depth

outputs.name: SoilTempArray
outputs.description: Array of soil temperatures in layers

functions.name: init
